critical role sideblog!
ao3 is mightynein69

(they/them pronouns)

question: Essik
answer:
first impression:

“people are going to ship this guy with caleb”

impression now:

hot wizard boy

favorite moment:

When he was impressed by Caleb’s cat paw wave.

idea for a story:

Essik is unwellingly dragged into a sleepover Jester is having and hilarity ensues.

unpopular opinion:

I have none about him lmao

favorite relationship:

essik x Caleb but consider essik x jester (remember that awkward hug! priceless)

favorite headcanon:

Essik can’t walk/he doesn’t have legs so he uses a spell to get around

blog.title: nott is a sexual woman
blog.description: AJ, they/them

question: Character meme; Keg!
answer:
First impression: oh fuck.

Impression now: beard? hot. muscles? hot. keg? love.

Favorite moment: “you could do better than her”

Idea for a story: anything that involves keg meeting up with cali and discussing their interactions with the mighty nein. like. the sheer fucking disparity.

Unpopular opinion: women with beards are hot fucking fight me.

Favorite relationship: her and nott. what a fucking mini friendship arc theirs was. love it.

Favorite headcanon: her hair is actually like. a vibrant red, orangier than caleb’s but you can’t tell because it is very dirty and she likes it that way. also- that she talks to herself. a lot. especially since her bff died. she’s lonely out on the roads, and she hates the silence.

blog.description: AJ, they/them

question: Caleb?
answer:
First impression: meh. no strong feelings, really.

Impression now: a trash can on fire, but like. someone draped a handmade scarf around it.

Favorite moment: the accent scene was good, but the little moments when he talks with frumpkin- good shit.

Idea for a story: modern au caleb who gardens on the side decides to open a stall at the farmer’s market to help pay for his book addiction. his fucking tomatoes are the envy of all, and through a series of wacky and slightly improbable events, he gains an interesting medley of friends.

Unpopular opinion: he has a sense of humor. he laughs and goes along with jester’s antics. he might not be as loud about it but he’s a weirdo too!! he does the shenanigans also!!

Favorite relationship: oh jeez. him and nott, although him and beau are in the running.

Favorite headcanon: he is always, always wearing a frumpkin scarf unless explicitly stated otherwise.

summary: Back in December I posted my first (and so far only) Vaxmore fic, called The Air is Silk  I am now on my second turn listening...
body:
Back in December I posted my first (and so far only) Vaxmore fic, called The Air is Silk 

I am now on my second turn listening to/watching the first campaign and I was hit with Feels again, so I started writing a sequel. Just a handful of paragraphs for now as I don’t really have time to write fics bc exam period, but I had to get it out so I can get back to it later

Gilmore is often busy with his work.

Which means that, as much as he would like to stay in his house in Emon and take care of Vax, he needs to leave in order to continue setting up his new shop in Westruun.
Vax too, has business to attend to, people to kill and protect alongside his friends and allies, but Gilmore still enjoys another two days alone in his home with Vax in his bed and by his side.

It’s something they’ve both needed, but Gilmore suspects Vax needed this respite more than he’ll ever admit to.

Gilmore is fine with that, can see it on Vax’s face even though the words remain unspoken.

As Vax walks away, back to his keep, his family, Gilmore feels the temptation to reach out and hold him back, take him in his arms again and not let him go. It’s a silly thing to want, but it’s a want all the same.

The rogue looks better now, as he walks away, the robe Gilmore had gifted him with folded gently and carefully inside his bag to hide and protect it from the outside world.

Gilmore goes to sleep that night, feeling the emptiness in the bed besides him and his heart feels heavy as he realises having Vax there made his house feel like a home for the first time he can remember.

Back in December I posted my first (and so far only) Vaxmore fic, called The Air is Silk 

I am now on my second turn listening to/watching the first campaign and I was hit with Feels again, so I started writing a sequel. Just a handful of paragraphs for now as I don’t really have time to write fics bc exam period, but I had to get it out so I can get back to it later

blog.description: Hi, I'm Pepper. I'm 27 and I'm a trashlord who likes memes, feminism, D&D, and history. Ravenclaw/Cabin 6. Actually Autistic and Actually OCD. Living with Ehlers Danlos. Celtic Pagan. I write shitty fanfiction for Critical Role, maybe you've heard of me.

summary: Betrothed - MeBeThem4815 - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Betrothed - MeBeThem4815 - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 18/?
Fandom: Critical Role (Web Series)
Rating: Explicit
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Caleb Widogast/Mollymauk Tealeaf
Characters: The Mighty Nein, Original Characters, Calianna (Critical Role), Kiri (Critical Role), Keg (Critical Role), Vex'ahlia (Critical Role), Percival “Percy” Fredrickstein Von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III, Keyleth (Critical Role), Original Percival “Percy” de Rolo III/Vex'ahlia Child(ren)
Additional Tags: Arranged Marriage, tags will change as fic updates, Slow Burn, fic with art, wet dreams, self loathing issues, Mutual Pining, canon typical violence and racism, Masturbation, Making Out, guided masturbation, Dirty Talk, Hurt/Comfort, Gift Giving, handjobs, mutual bathing, Anal Fingering, First Time Sex, Emotional Sex, Knotting, Politics, infernal kink, Language Kink, Pain Kink, Molly In Lingerie, Toys, Baground Clay/Wulf
Summary:

After nearly a decade of war, Archmage Caleb Widogast has brokered a peace with the Xhorasian empire. It comes at the cost of his hand in marriage. They send the Nonagon, leader of their bloodhunters, to marry him. He wasn’t expecting a beautiful tiefling. He wasn’t expecting Mollymauk Tealeaf.

Summary:

After nearly a decade of war, Archmage Caleb Widogast has brokered a peace with the Xhorasian empire. It comes at the cost of his hand in marriage. They send the Nonagon, leader of their bloodhunters, to marry him. He wasn’t expecting a beautiful tiefling. He wasn’t expecting Mollymauk Tealeaf.

title: Race to the Ziggurat
body:
Vax'ildan: I [rushed in by myself] in order to save your sister! I hope you would do the same if you saw my sister in danger.
Percy: I would.
Vex'ahlia: Of course he would.
Percy: But mostly because I fear her.
Vex'ahlia, delighted: You think I'm scary?
Percy: You ARE scary.

dialogue.name: Vax'ildan
dialogue.label: Vax'ildan:

summary: The Traveler for the character headcanon thing, perhaps? 🍭
question: The Traveler for the character headcanon thing, perhaps? 🍭
answer:
First Impression: There was already a God in D&D called the Traveler and Jester’s Traveler is different, so when I looked him up nothing that came up sounded like what Jester described so I was super confused.

Impression now: I’m, like, 90% sure this guy is Artagan? Maybe?

Favorite moment: The conversation he had with Jester in the Pillow Trove room.

Idea for a story: All I have related to him is a story where Jester dies and the Traveler comes to Caduceus to help him revive her

Unpopular opinion: I don’t really trust him. Is that an unpopular opinion? I’m not sure. I think shit is gonna hit the fan at Traveler-Con.

Favorite relationship: Jester, naturally

Favorite headcanon: That he’s Artagan trying to climb his way up the ladder of power.
